data.name: سمسون‌ اپز
data.description: SamssonApps is a premier, full service, design and development company offering end to end technology solutions for mobile and web platforms. Committed to quality, our prime focus is placed on leveraging high-standards in design and development technologies. We specialize in providing technical and UI/UX consultancy including product development, QA, launch and maintenance. We also help brands connect more deeply with their clients through experiences for phones, tablets and other smart devices
